name: Grand Crime City Chase 2016 - Reckless Speed Driving Adventure with Police Sirens
name_original: Grand Crime City Chase 2016 - Reckless Speed Driving Adventure with Police Sirens
description:
Become a police driver in new arrival of police driving games Police Driving City Car stands out as it has unique city car stunts controls . Playing as real police drivea and follow the criminals at the crazy speed. With radar speed detector in the car test your high speed chase skills.

You are on duty in the crime city as police car driver to follow the high speed cars who are dangerous to law abiding citizen. Police driving city car game simulate you as cop to follow the over speeding vehicles which makes it a unique experience.
This game gives you a chance to become crime town police car driver in one level and Police car crime city cops chase and arrest duty in other level. Enjoy with realistic police lights and sirens.

Download the Grand Crime City Chase 2016 today.
